page.shortlink: api client api a5 d date relative namespace
page.description: The namespace for relative date defaults. Used by *[link:Date.toRelative]*.

property.name: flow
property.description: The flow of the date parts (e.g. "years", "months", "days", etc.). Can be "ltr" (the default) or "rtl". If it is "ltr" then the largest unit of time will be the left-most value shown.

page.note: Any properties or methods in this namespace can be replaced in order to support other languages or formats.
